website_summaries.verdict: Offers noteworthy HD resolution and a well-rounded mix of features.
pros: A great, affordable choice thanks to its enhanced motion clarity, even during high-speed action
cons: This TV's input options are quite limited, which some owners find frustrating

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Picture Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I normally am reluctant to buy a TV online but seeing a Sony TV at this price I thought I would give it try. ABSOLUTELY IMPRESSED! What stands out the most is the perfect colors. I watch everything from movies, news and sports so seeing people look like "real" people and not weird skin colors was a plus. I just finished watching a basketball game and I'm definitely convinced I made the right decision.
customer_reviews.author: A. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I received the product to replace a smaller Samsung and this one feels like garbage. I installed anyway and the screen looked like it was cracked on the inside when you turned the tv on. Sending right back to amazon and Sony should be ashamed of themselves for charging so much for a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: ETob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent TV
customer_reviews.text: Received the TV quickly by UPS and it was very well packed. Arrived in excellent condition. Only in operation for 3 days, but I would say this TV has outstanding quality for the price. I am extremely happy. No problems of any kind including viewing at an angle. I would have preferred a hard-copy detailed users manual, but have to settle for one online. Be careful with reviews that clearly are not for this TV which just came out a few months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H. Newhouse

customer_reviews.title: Internet freedom
customer_reviews.text: Disliked, having to be connected to the internet. In order to enjoy all features
customer_reviews.author: Nonya

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on every channel... Sony's Back!
customer_reviews.text: Wow the colors on this Sony TV are just beautiful... Bought it for my extra room/workout space. After shopping around I actually got a different TV that looked horrible and grainy on my regular TV shows. Sales guy said at my local store said Sony was the best. It's is! Might need to replace my living room TV now with the 75"
customer_reviews.author: Jill Piantieri

customer_reviews.title: Best you can get
customer_reviews.text: Have gone through many TV's and manufacturers over the years and Sony has always been the best. Especially the Bravia line. This TV is on point with my experience with the company. When you stroll down Walmart "4K" TV isles and really look at the screens you'll see text with blurred edges, washed out colors and small motion blur. Not here. It really is superior image quality with crisp lines, no motion blur and sharp colors with true blacks. Though a couple hundred more than WM tv's its still by far the best can you get for the money.
customer_reviews.author: C b

customer_reviews.title: Sony is so much better than the Sansung it replaced
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is the best I have ever seen, better than the new TV"s costing 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: Henry L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality tv worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Quality 65 inch 4k UHD. Great clarity, color, easy to operate. Works well with Sony sound bar. Get it. I used Amazon 5 payment plan. Perfect. Didn't break the bank
customer_reviews.author: paul barrett

customer_reviews.title: tremendous TV for the money...I would have paid double for it.
customer_reviews.text: I received the TV from UPS with no sign of damage. Set up was a breeze and in less than an hour, I had the remotes programmed, the apps set up and sat back and marveled at the picture. It is breath-takingly beautiful, even watching old TV reruns of MeTV. I am extremely pleased with the product and can't believe that this wonderful piece of equipment sells for less than $400. Well done Sony!
customer_reviews.author: James C. Gilliam

customer_reviews.title: Great 4k TV
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Excellent sound!!! Easy to switch between app and live TV. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: WOODSTYLE

customer_reviews.title: Downgrade from Samsung
customer_reviews.text: My Samsung 4k went down in a lightening storm and I replaced it with a this SONY. I wish I had gone back with another Samsung. I could browse the internet with the Samsung but can't with this SONY. I wish I had known that before buying.
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and great 4K TV
customer_reviews.text: If you are thinking about upgrading your tv, this is it! I cant say enough about the picture, quality and design. This was the perfect upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: TV will not connect to the Internet
customer_reviews.text: Great TV, excellent picture, but won't connect, or stay connected to the Internet. I have multiple electronic devices in my home as well as other brand Smart TVs and have no issues with those. I've upgraded my Internet speed and this TV either doesn't connect - get an error approximately 80% of the time, or it loses connection before a movie or show is complete so I don't finish watching it. Frustrating!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Should've stuck with Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Always had Samsung TVs and although this Sony was $300 more, I went the this Sony anyway. I went to a store for them to tell me this TV has billions of Colors instead of Samsung's millions of color. I am using a 4k fire stick and have watched numerous 4k uhd programs inside the TVs smart functions. The quality is just ok. Nothing like the demo in the store and just not a huge upgrade from my Last tv. Unboxing and setup was fine. Did it myself. If it wasnt such a hassle to return I would do for the Samsung. Do not buy this over a Samsung or even the Vizio Quantum tv.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth won’t pair, returned.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this TV but the Bluetooth would not pair with any headphones. I tried Sony, AirPods, others, none would pair. Downloaded an android Bluetooth Pair app, it saw the headphones but would not pair. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Gomer2280

customer_reviews.title: A Great 4k TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: Don't believe the reviews claiming that you cannot update this tv to the latest andriod version. The first thing this TV did once I logged into my google/gmail account was update itself. The picture on this television is great! I always stick with Sony when I purchase a television and this one is great so far.
customer_reviews.author: j.g.

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: Update my tv started acting weird 1/2 the screen is lighter than the other cant watch black screens comfortably it's like a shining light in the corener... hence back light led prob.dont update the tv to....
customer_reviews.author: 80sMetal

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: Would like to write about tv but box was punctured upon arrival and puncture impaled the screen. Disappointing but will review once replacement is received.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Spinelli

customer_reviews.title: It's a SONY!
customer_reviews.text: Just one thing: The audio out jack is good for earphones and feeding an external amp. It will not drive speakers.
customer_reviews.author: roy wilson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic picture
customer_reviews.text: I love the picture on this TV - extremely clear! The Smart part is awesome! I'm able to access my Prime TV, Disney+ & Philo as well as many many others. Cons - The sound quality is good - but loudness it does not have. Sound bar needed. BOO! For some stupid reason I can't access my Prime music. BOO! Hence - 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Strohecker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome with adjustments and
customer_reviews.text: This TV is thin, thin, thin (which was critical for my use). However, like most TVs, this one comes with the picture adjusted for market display (which is terribly over vibrant with far to much contrast). Get rid of the "smart" adjustments, and bang, awesome picture. It has HDR, but HDR, in my opinion destroys picture quality and realistic colors. 4K is awesome (simple equates to twice the pixel density both vertically and horizontally, compared to 1080 without the annoying alteration of color or brightness depth). I love Sony monitors and TVs because of their excellent reproduction of actual color and contrast edge-to-edge (I just takes a little time to remove the gimmicks all new TVs are set standard to).
customer_reviews.author: Clyde S.

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: State of the art TV. Great picture . Extra slim design looks beautiful in any room setting . Has all the most advanced features and the remote controls our Directv receiver . Highly recommend ,
customer_reviews.author: andre

customer_reviews.title: R.I.P. pixels
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed at all with this TV--picture quality no better than my 2017 SONY. The dead pixels on the screen earned it a quick trip back to the merchant. I'm going to look at other brands for my next TV.
customer_reviews.author: toobz

customer_reviews.title: This Sony TV is an excellent model at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always liked Sony products, and their TVs in particular. This is the second Bravia I’ve purchased. The other one was under 10 years old and worked great, but I just wanted an updated model. It was easy to hook up with my other tech, actually doing a lot of it for me. The picture quality is excellent. It’s not a huge TV so it doesn’t become the centerpiece of the room.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieW.

customer_reviews.title: A Good Deal Through Amazon Prime
customer_reviews.text: This TV is big. Buying such a huge ticket item like this through Amazon was a first for me. The ease of ordering and receiving was easy. I went with a Sony after horrible Samsung experiences with multiple products of theirs. I also purchased a 3 year protection plan.
customer_reviews.author: Renard

customer_reviews.title: Love it and at a great price point during Black Friday week!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll be honest... if it wasn’t for oled burnin I’d have an oled. Outside of that I spent time reviewing on my own both online and at retailers. I have to say Sony colors look best compared to other brands to me. Compared the QLEDs from Samsung and lg nano... except for slight differences which most home users wouldn’t notice anyway, this tv is solid. I say all of this based on picture quality and crispness of resolution. I don’t use the droid smart tv stuff as I stream from pc media center. The box isn’t wrapped so be home for arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Really great value. Only issue (if you’re not wall mounting) is the TV sits at an angle. It was made this way for a few reasons but it looks awkward so had to shimmy (temporary fix shown until we can find something nicer). All in all beautiful picture and pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy a television from Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tv. in Nov 2019 because it was a great sale price with the notion of putting it up once a basement addition was completed sometime in March of 2020. We put it up in April 2020 and everything looked great until we turned the tv on only to notice a crack in the screen. Contacted Amazon and of course they said there is nothing they can do because the return policy had lapsed. THIS IS RIDICULOUS! The crack is internal meaning that it was damaged sometime in shipping and Amazon is basically telling us to pound sand. SHAME ON AMAZON!!!
customer_reviews.author: mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Just a little thicker than expected for wall mounting.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality picture. Very bright. Had to turn down the brightness to enjoy viewing. Replaced a plasma which has a gorgeous picture but also was drawing tons of power.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Ranck

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the $$
customer_reviews.text: Great TV. Have it installed on the wall in my bedroom, can now watch TV without my glasses! Picture is crystal clear and features replaced numerous on demand devices.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great buy; great pic; easy setup
customer_reviews.text: So I don't like that it's Android, still figuring it out a bit since I'm an apple dude. But the netflix/youtube/amazon streaming works great. Worked right out of the box, setup was easy. Beautiful picture and decent sound. Got the 65" - would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Chet 523

customer_reviews.title: screws were not included
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger version of tv and really like it. However My problem with the 43m no screws for the tv. I have been trying to find the correct one with put sucesss. No being able to set to up makes the tv unless for me
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Developed purple/blue spots on screen after 8 months which are getting worse.
customer_reviews.text: Of course not Amazon's fault but the above issue is inexcusable. I'll have to get another TV before long, as repairs, even under warranty, are impractical. The good news, sort of, is there are great alternatives at lower prices with better warranties.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Worth the premium over Samsung
customer_reviews.text: Runs Android 8, same as the Nvidia shield Tv but with tv integration. It does seem a little slower than the Nvidia shield Tv and that's 3 years old... You need to really point the remote at the tv or it does nothing. Picture is amazing. Remote has voice control which is a must have for me, can be controlled via Alexa devices also(hit and miss at times). Why other brands use their own crappy OS, I don't understand, just standardize on Android TV.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Evers

customer_reviews.title: Great mid-sized smart TV.
customer_reviews.text: Like this TV. Nice picture, great sound, lots of features. Same lame Sony Android software as my other Bravia but sufficient for most applications. Required an OS upgrade out of the box. I installed it using a wall mount and so far it's been flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this TV. I can control the volume from my phone using Google home if my partner is playing games too loud! Ahah The picture quality is great, very good sound and easy to use. The stand is sturdy, we have a few cats that climb around the back and we felt confident the feet will hold the TV well. The leads get tucked away nicely in the stand and all in all it's a very aesthetically pleasing item in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Barnes

customer_reviews.title: You will need a sound bar at minimum.
customer_reviews.text: At only 10 watts the speakers lack a lot. Requires 70% + just to hear most shows and the sound quality is poor. A sound bar or surround system is a must. Picture quality is awesome. Features and smart tv function are very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for the price and the picture is great too !
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tv so don't worry about what the other people have said in there reviews. Easy to set up and use as I did it all myself when lifting this beast up on on top of my entertainment center. The picture quality and price can't be beat so just buy one and you won't regret it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV but Slow OS
customer_reviews.text: I almost wish I would have picked up the Samsung. However I do like that apps selection more than Samsung. The picture and TV is great but the Android system can be so slow. Changing channels can take several seconds to happen.
customer_reviews.author: SAC

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great tv upgrade for my main home theater monitor. For it on sale discounted, so that was a bonus. Image quality is pretty decent and packed with features. The built in speakers are a bit disappointing, even for regular viewing. A sound bar upgrade is definitely warranted if you want any sort of decent audio. Just the nature of thin bezel designed tv's these days.
customer_reviews.author: H. Do

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: When you buy a 4K ultra HD TV, you want the best picture possible. I cant get the HDR function to work with my Apple TV (I tested in different TVs and the Apple TV is not the issue), I had to exchange because of a black line in the middle of the screen, the functionality is horrible and it keep pushing to use android. Even PlayStation (from Sony) is not fully integrated with the TV. Horrible SW and picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jonatas Barcellos

customer_reviews.title: Great tv for nice price
customer_reviews.text: I own a 55 inch sony so I knew I was buying a quality tv. The 75 inch is a step up, watching movies on this 4k at this size is next level. I never cared for 4k blu ray films but this 4k convinced me to upgrade my library from blu ray to 4k blu ray movies, I luv it, I was nervous to have a tv delivered to me because of some customers saying their TVs came damaged, I'm thankful that my tv was not damaged when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: For a Sony I was expecting a lot better. Their quality is not up to par. Can't play some video consoles. No VGA connection. The smart apps are not really alluring. Then next tv will be a Vizio or Samsung. After weeks of having the Sony it developed a digital line across the screen. Not good.Sony thumbs down. Your quality is null to 0
customer_reviews.author: felion robinson

customer_reviews.title: decent picture
customer_reviews.text: the up-scaling software leaves a lot of room for improvement watching a blue-ray at 1080p and even in a movie lots of motion blur . So sports viewings a bit less than what you would think considering its a Sony . Going from tv to apps has a significant blank screen delay something you would expect in a low end brand .
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Smart home features severely lacking, no software support from Sony
customer_reviews.text: This is a tv being sold as new with an outdated OS. This tv is running Android TV 8 (10 was released Jan 2020) and Sony has no plans to update it further. That means it's integration with Google assistant is MINIMAL, you can play content from a small handful of services. Power and volume are flaky. Now you can use the remote to talk to the tv and get more done, but IMO that's not the point of a service integration. Picture and sound are really good, but I couldn't justify paying for a premium TV with outdated software that didn't work as well as my nearly 5 year old Vizio. So I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: BookLover

customer_reviews.title: Very good image quality... but...
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is very good, and I am completely pleased with it. Although sound quality is awful, this tv does not sound good at all. You would need to buy any external sound system to take good advantage of this tv. Additionally, I have mixed feelings with the Android integrations, the interface is slow, it is not responsive and UX-wise it is not great. Especially after owning an LG smart tv, which IMO it is much better than this TV.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: its ok tv
customer_reviews.text: picture quality is not great for the value of the tv its hard to setup a good picture to watch on all channels its very heavy to move in compare to the other tv than i see overall its just ok i will spend money on another brand i thought cant go wrong with sony brand but i was wrong
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL A FALCON

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for money
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I prefer the "smaller" TVs. This one was just what we were looking for. Very lightweight compared to our last "thin" TV. The sound is adequate for what we are needing it for; although some may want the sound bar to enhance the experience. We have been very impressed with the picture quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy so far...
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is most times a 5 sometimes not....sound bar is very good for me....seems no just as good as old surround sound system I paid 1.5k for. Smart features good though I wish navigation was easier with mouse or pad and keyboard. Not using the remote. For the price I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C

customer_reviews.title: Suitable Display. Otherwise Disappointing product.
customer_reviews.text: It is a good tv overall. my problem with it is that the android tv experience which is outdated anyways does not function whatsoever because the wifi connection to the tv doesn't work. every other device in my house is connected fine, my wifi is top notch. even the tv was connected to wifi and worked initially but now after a few months it crapped out. poor quality in that area I'm afraid.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Perry

customer_reviews.title: Slow...not Responsive
customer_reviews.text: This TV is SLOW when using the apps. Very frustrating! The TV has a bad spot but Amazon is letting me swap it out. I’m keeping the TV but putting it in a spot that’s not used frequently.
customer_reviews.author: MMTW

customer_reviews.title: If You Care About Your Privacy, Don't Buy
customer_reviews.text: The TV can't be used without accepting a Google User Agreement. I'm a loyal Sony customer... this was my 3rd TV in a row, and i've bought more products from them, but no more. There's no way to get the TV to function without accepting terms from Google, including giving them permission to upload, review, and store audio taken from the microphone on the remote control. Facing a restocking fee to return. Very unhappy with all parties involved.
customer_reviews.author: HST Rules

customer_reviews.title: NICE TV
customer_reviews.text: So far I am quite pleased with this TV. Easily set up, picture is good and it comes with excellent instructions. Only had it a couple of days so can't give long term evaluation. I like the remote that has voice control if wanted. It helps that I have an android phone and Google assistant so I am familiar with the android features of the TV.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Picture!
customer_reviews.text: I expect nothing but the best from Sony, and they never disappoints. The colors and picture quality is amazing- and the sound is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: knicoles

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic TV...With ONE BIG problem
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic 4k tv...Easy to setup and operate. Picture quality is great. The arrived on time with no issues. The only problem which is actually a big problem is that the app needed to connect the TV to your Amazon Echo device isn't installed; and it can't be downloaded from the app store. The Amazon customer care are clueless as to how to solve the problem.
customer_reviews.author: iriejamaican

customer_reviews.title: Sony X800G 65 Inch TV: 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV
customer_reviews.text: I'm Back in love watching movies! For the last ten years, I owned a Sony 55-inch Bravia 1080p TV. I thought it was time to move up to a 4k Television and I did. I am impressed with the visual qualities of this set! I have, again fallen in love with watching movies!
customer_reviews.author: Nos4nusTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like
customer_reviews.text: Legs took a few minutes to attach but other than that, no problems. Pretty light for a tv this size. Nice remote that has everything and more. Gorgeous picture. Had it for awhile and can’t think of any negatives. Oh yeah, price was great too, snagged it for $500.
customer_reviews.author: JIMMY CAMURATI

customer_reviews.title: Big
customer_reviews.text: Only gave it 4 stars because I just received it yesterday. I did program it and used the WiFi to watch a few minutes of a couple movies/shows. It sure seems to be a fantastic picture and the remote and TV seem easy to use. Setup was very easy. Will not be using it too much as it goes in my family room which I am remodeling now. Probably a couple months before it is complete. Will mount on the wall when room is finished. But for now very happy with the TV,
customer_reviews.author: Steven L. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great tv great value.
customer_reviews.text: Like this tv so much! Wasn't sure that it would be as great because of the great pricing. Not so! In addition Sony support was outstanding when we had questions. If you're looking for an outstanding value on a quality tv don't hesitate to get this one.
customer_reviews.author: 'Nando

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in November. Wanted to give it some usage before review. Not an expert on TV's. All I need is a screen to view. Like: This is a HUGE screen. Big sports guy here. Great clear picture. 4K movie view is phenomenal. I have a home theater system that compliments the unit very well. Dislike: Periodically the unit seems to freeze when I transfer from alternate inputs. I restart to correct.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great way to encourage your children to read.
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoy hard power restarting your brand new smart TV every time you turn it on in order to use the Android TV function, Oh boy do we have the TV for you. You can count on this TV to never ever connect to your WIFI network without pulling the power and plugging it back in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. Great setup and unboxing. Great value for the money. Warnings: - Alexa integration is poor - the stand is not adjustable and the TV looks up couple degrees - remote control is picky and some buttons are hard to see
customer_reviews.author: P. Berenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This Sony 65” TV has been a great purchase. I’ve had mine five months now and it operates perfectly. I use my fire stick service on mine. I was also able to set the TV up myself. But I would recommend you have an assistant. It was a little heavy. It was delivered right to my door step. So I dragged it in and assembled it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnette662u

customer_reviews.title: Quality product and shipping speed
customer_reviews.text: A top quality TV from top quality Sony rated number ONE by Consumer Report. A $700.00 TV going at half the price! I will be checking them out for my next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph C. Herrera

customer_reviews.text: Everything about the TV is really nice, except the remote. It’s not Bluetooth. It’s IR, so you have to be pointing the remote directly at the sensor. Very dumb. We have had a different TV for 8 or so years that has a Bluetooth remote. Why doesn’t this one?
customer_reviews.author: Mqondo

customer_reviews.title: A great 65” 4K TV!
customer_reviews.text: We experienced a strong power surge that killed my previous TV. Yes, we use a good UPS, but this somehow got to it. Anyway, the Sony may not have all the extras, like voice Roku; however, Sony makes one great TV. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Tims

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my 10 year old 40 inch Samsung for this and I love it. The picture quality could be sharper but I think it matches the price. I love that I'm able to connect my Alexa / Google to it and control it without using a remote (for the most part). I have the 55' and It's a great size. I suggest having someone else help you put on the legs when trying to put it together. All in all I would recommend this to anyone for $500. Google needs to step their game up with voice compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: kurt

customer_reviews.title: Got a Dud
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is good for the money, sound just ok but I got a lemon and now must hassle with a return. Not an easy task when your older, disabled and this tv is huge. Amazon delivery drivers were super nice and set the box inside the house for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wise

customer_reviews.title: Screen has been damaged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful TV, EXCEPT...FROM THE BOTTOM OF THE SCREEN IS A DARK SPOT ABOUT 4" WIDE WITH CONCENTRIC CIRCLES RADIATING FROM IT. I NOW HAVE TO REPACKAGE THIS MONSTER TV TO SEND IT BACK AND DO WITHOUT WHILE THEY FIGURE OUT HOW TRO REPLACE IT. I AM VERY DISAPPOINTED.
customer_reviews.author: Greg ELVANDER

customer_reviews.title: If I had a girlfriend
customer_reviews.text: If I had a girlfriend I would watch every movie I own with her because this thing is✨✨ nice. Beautiful display sounds great perfect for gaming. Easy install and came faster than expected. The only thing is the stand for the tv is huge. Barley able to fit on my TV stand, literally.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic picture
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the TV. Great picture. No disappointment for me. I bought this to watch TV, not play video games or surf the internet. Watching football or hockey makes it feel like you're at the game. Movies are great as well. Excellent colors and the sound is great. Could use slightly more volume, bud not bad.
customer_reviews.author: paul harrington

customer_reviews.title: Replaced my 250 LB 36" Trinitron from 2001 with this and it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger and lighter than the Trinitron XBR from a few decades ago. More features than I need.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Gauff

customer_reviews.title: Sony made a great product again and priced well
customer_reviews.text: I never owned a TV over 55 but I’m impressed by the quality in this 75 Sony,updates have on par for streaming and upscale for satellite tv, I would recommend it to anyone who wants a larger tv for their home
customer_reviews.author: Tim Barger

customer_reviews.title: very nice but thought I ordered a 49XBR900F
customer_reviews.text: very nice but thought I ordered a 49XBR900F. disappointed in receiving the 800G.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Nice picture, sound could be better
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with picture quality, not as impressed with sound quality. Biggest disappointment with delivery., TV was left in the driveway outside garage. Happened to realize it was there when checking on delivery status only to read TV was "hand delivered" to occupant. OUTRIGHT LIE!!! Fortunately I realized it was in driveway before it sat outside in sub freezing temps for too long.

customer_reviews.title: nice TV , Sony hardware quality
customer_reviews.text: ez to setup, need 2 people to setup out of box. color is impressive in 4k , great for watching sports, got a black friday deal of under $1000 , would recommend getting external speakers to enjoy movies.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent right out of th box
customer_reviews.text: The Sony X800G 49 Inch TV was a best buy for me. nice features ,best price and setup was easy. SONY HAS THE BEST Predicted Reliability OUT OF ALL THE OTHER TV BRANDS. THANKS AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: CHUCKIETWO

customer_reviews.title: This TV is not 120hz refresh rate like it says in the description.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the TV on Black Friday, didnt bother setting it up until the week before Christmas. I have a 55inch Sony tv that I bought in 2016 that is 240hz refresh rate and the picture is great. I figured half of that shouldn't be that bad. Well I was wrong I cant sit and watch the tv for 3 minutes without trying to make adjustments to improve the picture. The tv was on sale for 699.99 so for the price it is what it is. On the fence whether I'm going to return it or not.
customer_reviews.author: D Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Sony is quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality , easy use , and installation very easy , thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Hugo

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: This tv was the perfect tv for me. I use it for watching 4k movies, gaming, and just watching casual videos on YouTube. It connects to your phone in seconds (including my iPhone even), and is very quick. The lighting needs adjusting once you get it, but then again which tv doesn’t? Great TV in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: trevor

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! Was worried about the picture quality being a previous owner of only Samsung TVs. Not disappointed at all! I love the picture quality and functionality of this tv
customer_reviews.author: Levon J.

customer_reviews.title: No need for cable or dish.
customer_reviews.text: Cromecast and google make this tv very easy to use. No need to pay for cable or dish because HULU and Netflix get you all of the tv viewing you could possibly need or want!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Lee Hinton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful picture & easy set up
customer_reviews.text: My bf has a Bravia tv & I was always amazed at the crisp & vivid picture quality. When i was shopping for a larger new tv to replace my 12 yr old bedroom tv I knew I wanted a Bravia. I had saved the 49” in my cart for a couple months & when the price dropped about $200 I decided to buy it. I’m very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LISA

customer_reviews.title: Descent TV for the Budget minded consumer. Nice job Sony
customer_reviews.text: At first I was kinda hesitant about the Sony because of my love for Vizio but it was a slight improvement over my Vizio, I don't like that you have to have internet to use all the features some of us can't afford internet Sony Please keep that in mind. Overall no complaint so far.
customer_reviews.author: Whill Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to order a tv from here but I was not disappointed at all! This tv is exactly what I was looking for and more. Has screen mirroring which I love!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good but X950 series is better!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two Sonys for the same room. This and a 55” X950G. The X950 series has a much clearer picture, most noticeable on the clarity of black color. I would spend the extra money for the 950 series for both if I had it to do again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice replacement for my old Sony
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly, packaged well. Good installation instructions. Sound and picture quality very good. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Picture!
customer_reviews.text: As always, Sony doesn't let me down! This is a fabulous TV, great picture quality and awesome features. Screen size is just perfect for me. I absolutely LOVE it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Nice bright picture
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Nice bright picture. I’m planning to cut the cord and this tv should make it a smoother transition. If it goes well I’ll replace my other older (not smart) tv with a larger Sony.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the Sony brand name fool you this TV is garbage
customer_reviews.text: So mad at myself for buying this piece of crap. I’ve never been more disappointed with a Sony product. The remote control is absolutely worthless and must have designed by a moron.
customer_reviews.author: Rikkirat

customer_reviews.title: Not 49 inch! it's actually 48.5
customer_reviews.text: I noticed it was much smaller than I expected because I have the same exact TV but the 2017 model. The problem was printed on the box: it's actually 48.5''. You'd think half and inch wouldn't make much of a difference, but it absolutely does. Nowhere on the product description does it say it not 49''. I feel scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Sony X800G 55 Inch TV: 4K Ultra HD Smart LED TV with HDR and Alexa Compatibility - 2019 Model
customer_reviews.text: I got this Sony X800G 55 Inch TV: 4K Ultra HD to replace a 55 in LG TV that the pitcher went out on. Still learning the Sony. Will give updates later.
customer_reviews.author: bwb30815

customer_reviews.title: Completely unbelievable box of junk.
customer_reviews.text: Why would Amazon send a product that was literally in pieces. Seems as though someone would have noticed how badly the box was damaged and the noise of rattling broken parts?
customer_reviews.author: J. Aaron Persinger

customer_reviews.title: My second one of these
customer_reviews.text: I really like how clear and crips the picture is on this TV so I actually bought a second to replace another TV. No issues setting up at all. Lots of customizable features for picture and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Pyro

customer_reviews.title: Sony will always be in my home
customer_reviews.text: How do you possibly go wrong with Sony.. bought this Ina rush because my TV of 15 years didn't want to turn on. Arrived fast and it was so lightweight, I easily brought it into my home myself and mounted to wall.
customer_reviews.author: Tinacious1

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 4K, Ultra High Definition!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing 4K, Ultra High Definition video! I don’t mind the old Android operation system, since I use a 4K Apple TV. The sound fed to my external audio system is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rallion

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this tv and have no problems!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this TV a couple months ago. We like it and have no issues with it at all. You won’t be amazed at the picture quality like a tv displayed in a store but it’s still really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Great picture, but remote needs help!
customer_reviews.text: Great 4K picture quality, crisp and clear picture. The remote isn’t a truly universal remote, the tv comes with 2 stick on sensors to allow it to work the tv cable set box with your tv, but I haven’t been able to get it to work from day one ( and I had my techie college age son try) and he couldn’t get it to work..... so I’m using 2 remotes. Otherwise it’s a Great tv for our bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Treski

customer_reviews.title: Sony TV 43"
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Sony TVs for many decades. Their picture quality is just the best. I will agree with one reviewer about this TV regarding the Sleep Timer. Too many clicks to turn it on!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth, Kitty Hawk, NC

customer_reviews.title: Great tv and picture
customer_reviews.text: Great Tv. I had a 46 inch Bravia for 8 yrs or so. It was led and had a great picture but my house was broken into and tv stolen. This tv is as good as the one I had. Really nice picture quality and works with all my devices. The price was also great!
customer_reviews.author: Tabetha brown

product_meta.title: Sony XBR-55X800G 55" 4K UHD LED Smart Android TV with HDR (2019)
product_meta.description: Size:55-Inch| Style:TVEnjoy crisp, realistic details in your favorite entertainment with the X800G 4K HDR TV. Control your TV and smart home with your voice using Android TV and Google Assistant built in. 4K X-Reality PRO technology and Dynamic Contrast Enhancer technologies refine details and display contrast with stunning accuracy, making shows and movies come alive. Picture Modes: Vivid, Standard, Custom, Theater Pro, Theater Home, Sports, Animation, Photo-Vivid, Photo-Standard, Photo-Custom, Game, Graphics.
feature_bullets: Rediscover detail with 4K X-Reality PRO: With 4K X-Reality PRO, every image is upscaled closer to true 4K quality for remarkable clarity
Motionflow XR 240: Enjoy smooth and sharp details even in fast-moving sequences with Motionflow XR; 60Hz Refresh Rate
Works with Alexa: Connect your Alexa-enabled devices for seamless hands-free control of your Sony TV. With Alexa, you can power up your TV, change channels, control volume, and more
Made to listen: Your listening is as lifelike as your viewing. ClearAudio+ fine tunes TV sound for an immersive, emotionally enriching experience that seems to surround you.
Chromecast built-in: You can easily cast your favorite entertainment like YouTube or Netflix from your personal device on to the stunning BRAVIA screen
Android TV: Voice search provides you with the power of Google search, allowing you to find content across different services without the hassle of time-consuming text entry
Dimensions(WxHxD): Without Stand: 48 7/8 x 28 1/2 x 3 1/8"; With Stand: 48 7/8 x 31 x 13 1/4"
In the box: TV, Stands, Remote Control, Batteries, Power Cord, IR Blaster, Quick Setup Guide, Operating Instructions
